effects: Increase the limit burst gauge fill rate by 50%
Increase ATK by 30% when equipped with a Dagger
Increase ATK by 30% when equipped with a Sword
Increase ATK by 30% when equipped with a Great Sword
Increase ATK by 30% when equipped with a Katana

desc_short: Increase burst stone fill rate and boost ATK when equipped with a short sword, sword, large sword, or katana
提高極限技石對極限技槽的增加量+提高裝備短劍劍大劍刀時攻擊的數值
버스트 스톤에 의한 상승량 상승+단검, 검, 대검, 도 장착 시 공격력 상승
Les pierres de limite remplissent plus vite la jauge et augmente l'ATT lorsqu’une épée normale, courte ou longue ou un katana est équipé
Verstärkt den Effekt von Limit-Steinen + erhöht ANG, wenn mit Kurzschwert, Schwert, Großschwert oder Katana ausgerüstet.
Las piedras de estallido recuperan más EL, aumenta el ATQ al llevar espada corta, espada, espada larga o katana
